body:
Comment 11: 
You didn't need to set $GOROOT really, but in the script I posted
I assumed it was set, so that

cd $GOROOT/src

would take you to the src directory in the Go tree.
It's okay not to have it set, but then when you see me
suggest a command like

cd $GOROOT/src

you have to fill the right directory in by hand.  :-)
